question: 可愛い
sourceMnemonic: It's <kanji>possible</kanji> to <kanji>love</kanji> this thing. It's so gosh darn <vocabulary>cute</vocabulary>! Any really cute thing is possible to love.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for this word is screwed up, though if we're lucky, you already know the word for cute. It seems to have injected itself into American and English culture a decent amount, anyways. If you are one of the lucky ones, you'll know that this word is read as <ja><reading>かわいい</reading></ja>. If you're not, think of the cute thing being a cow. Then you say, "that <reading>cow<ja>はいい</ja></reading>" (<ja>かわい</ja>), or "that cow is good" because it's so cute.
